sql-case.value: CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE `t_log` (`id` int, `status` varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY COMMENT 'id', status varchar(10))
CREATE TEMPORARY TABLE t_log(id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS t_log (id int, status varchar(10))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), PRIMARY KEY(id))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), UNIQUE(id))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), UNIQUE(id))
CREATE TABLE t_order_item (order_item_id int, order_id int, user_id int, FOREIGN KEY (order_id) REFERENCES t_order (order_id) ON UPDATE CASCADE ON UPDATE CASCADE)
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), INDEX(id, status(10)))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), FULLTEXT INDEX (column1))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int, status varchar(10), SPATIAL INDEX (column2))
CREATE TABLE t_log (id int PRIMARY KEY, status varchar(10), check(id > 10))
CREATE TABLE t_log_bak_1 AS SELECT * FROM t_log
CREATE TABLE t_log_bak_2 (LIKE t_log)
CREATE INDEX idx_id ON t_log (id)
CREATE INDEX `idx_id` ON `t_log` (`id`)
CREATE INDEX idx_id USING BTREE ON t_log (id)
CREATE INDEX idx_id_status ON t_log (id, status(10))
CREATE UNIQUE INDEX uk_id ON t_log (id)
CREATE FULLTEXT INDEX idx_column1 ON t_log (column1)
CREATE SPATIAL INDEX idx_column2 ON t_log (column2)
